list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a distinctive attribute or aspect of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: safety features like dual air bags
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các tính năng an toàn như túi khí kép

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a newspaper or magazine article or a broadcast program devoted to the treatment of a particular topic, typically at length.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a feature on Detroit's downtown fishery
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một tính năng trên Detroit's Downtown Fishery

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have as a prominent attribute or aspect.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the hotel features a large lounge, a sauna, and a coin-operated solarium
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khách sạn có một phòng lớn, phòng xông hơi và phòng tắm nắng hoạt động bằng tiền xu
